issue.title: Central Authentication Service
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Goal is to integrate "Central Authentication Service (CAS)":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Central_Authentication_Service feature inside EasySDI:
* for every Java servlets using authentication mechanism (i.e. PROXY) with "Spring Security":https://wiki.jasig.org/display/CASC/Spring+Security+%28previously+Acegi%29+as+CAS+Client
* for Joomla as a new EasySDI CONTACT authentication plugin with "phpCAS":https://wiki.jasig.org/display/CASC/phpCAS

This feature will allow Single Sign On (SSO) capability for EasySDI solution based on server-side and client-side application and APIs (see http://www.jasig.org/cas)
